price: Na ardhi na milima ikaondolewa, na ikavunjwa kwa mvunjo mmoja,
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ
footnotes: Na ardhi na milima ikaondolewa pahala ilipo, na ikavunjwa mara moja,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
